column5: Looking for information on O'Sullivan Lake in Northern Ontario. Have book my first Canadian fishing trip on this lake with outfitters of OSullivans Rainbow. Looking forward to the trip in late June. Any info on this lake area would be appriciated.Thanks a bunch
E-mail me with any questions. We used to go there every year. And changed only for the sake of change. They have a website too. Nice lake.Pooch in central Illinois
